Package com.hoddmimes.distributor.bdxgwy

Interface BdxGatewayInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcastGateway
    public interface BdxGatewayInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getBroadcastGatewayName()
      Returns the "name" id used by the broadcast gateway instance
      Distributor getDistributor()
      Get reference to the distributor object used in the broadcast gateway
      DistBdxGwySubscrInterest getLocalActiveSubscriptions()
      Return all active subscriptions for a distributor clients being connected to this broadcast gateway instance.
      void localDistributorUpdate​(long pMulticastGroupId, java.lang.String pSubjectName, byte[] pMessageBytes)
      Invoked when the broadcast gateway has received an local update on any of the multicast groups that the gateway has connected to.
      void remoteBdxGatewayUpdate​(long pMulticastGroupId, java.lang.String pSubjectName, byte[] pMessageBytes)
      Invoked when receiving an update that the this gateway has subscribed to, from a remote broadcast gateway.
      boolean validInboundClient​(java.lang.String pRemoteBdxGwyName)
      Check what a remote bdx gateway connection is to be accepted or not.

      • localDistributorUpdate

        void localDistributorUpdate​(long pMulticastGroupId,
                            java.lang.String pSubjectName,
                            byte[] pMessageBytes)
        Invoked when the broadcast gateway has received an local update on any of the multicast groups that the gateway has connected to.
        Parameters:
        pMulticastGroupId - , the id identifying the multicast group on which thhe update was received
        pSubjectName - , the subject being updated
        pMessageBytes - , the message/object in its serialized form

                            byte[] pMessageBytes)
        Invoked when receiving an update that the this gateway has subscribed to, from a remote broadcast gateway.
        Parameters:
        pMulticastGroupId -
        pSubjectName -
        pMessageBytes -

      • validInboundClient

        boolean validInboundClient​(java.lang.String pRemoteBdxGwyName)
        Check what a remote bdx gateway connection is to be accepted or not. Only defined gateways are accepted.
        Parameters:
        pRemoteBdxGwyName - , bdx gateway "name" of the gateway connecting
        Returns:
        true if the gateway is allowed to connect otherwise false.
